data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Kanem, Chad so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kanem, Chad

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Kanem to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Kanem, Chad.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 27,674 believers in Kanem against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, I pray that the Buduma people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Kanem.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kanem, Chad.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Kanem, Chad.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Kanem
